  • Class
    Description
    ConnectFourGame
    ConnectFourGame contains the main logic of the ConnectFour game and all the implementation of functions to play the game.
    ConnectFourInitializer
    ConnectFourInitializer provides different ways in which the ConnectFour game can be initialized.
    GameGrid
    GameGrid represents the main grid of the ConnectFour game with slots for a token
    Player
    A record to store a player's details
